column5: Great town-home located in the historic heights neighborhood. Less than 15 minutes to downtown. The house is a short walk away from neighborhood bars and restaurants on 23rd, 19th and 20th. Nearby heights Hike and Bike trail. Close proximity Washington street (several bars and restaurants, vibrant night life). There is also a neighborhood gym in close proximity on 23rd street and an LA fitness about a 5 minute drive north on Shepherd.
column8: Heights Town-home: Ideal for the business traveler
